Articles.Content:
there is a thread titled what you did today so i decided to start one called what you will do tomorrow.

tomorrow I will be at work 1pm-10pm so ksp or simcity till i have to leave.

Edited July 15, 2013 by leax256

1am to 10pm? You're gonna do a 21h shift? What the flying hell?

I'm working from 11:30am to 4pm though here, AND I BETTER SEE .21 WHEN I COME BACK HOME.

Kidding, but that would be really nice
Tomorrow has yet to become present so i have no idea yet, ask again tomorrow!

1am to 10pm? You're gonna do a 21h shift? What the flying hell?

I'm working from 11:30am to 4pm though here, AND I BETTER SEE .21 WHEN I COME BACK HOME.

Kidding, but that would be really nice

sorry, i meant 1pm-10pm, thanks for pointing that out.

sorry, i meant 1pm-10pm, thanks for pointing that out.

that's what I thought too I found you quite amazing to work for that long!
I will try to make a good entry in the pico lander challenge. If recent history continues, then I will fail, but will still learn from it.

I'm working afternoon shift this week, so not much progress will be made in game. In the morning i will be busy in RL, then i'll spend 8 hours at work (plus about an hour of driving there and back), and when i return home i will be too tired to fight with my laggy mothership and wobbly launcher that will not lift probe with her transfer stage because it weights too much. I will be happy if i finish scanning Gilly.

What am I doing tomorrow?

Hockey. I'm really glad too, I haven't been in a practice on the ice in a long time.

Crossing my fingers for the new update when I get home. That would be amazing, to come home and play the new update, especially after working my butt off.

Edited July 16, 2013 by TheHockeyPlayer

I'm working from home tomorrow ( meaning KSP will be running on my game rig while I have my work laptop logged in beside).

Multitasking- Your doing it right, like a boss.
I'll probably record an episode at like 3 AM then I'm leaving for Mcmurray Alberta tomorrow. Then I'll upload episode 9 and record 12.

1: Get my heavy fueling station into LKO... stripped down a bit or boosted, I don't care which.

2: Tinker with graphic settings and see if I can't delay lag for another hundred parts or so.

3: Test the fueling station on the laptop and see if it handles it better or worse (sadly, it's actually faster than the gaming desktop, as the desktop is several years old, and the lappy is new)
tomorrow 0.21 comes out so I'll probably be starting again and exploring the new mun

tomorrow 0.21 comes out so I'll probably be starting again and exploring the new mun

Was that announced somewhere?

Was that announced somewhere?

No it hasn't, he'S extrapolating more than anything else.

While we are at times:

Something I never got is what is 0am / 0pm and 12am / 12pm in 24h format? Is all of this midnight? Or what of these is noon?
reply to this thread because it was 12:59 when I clicked on it.
